thread.title: Dramatic video captures near-death bid for selfies in Central Park
thread.title_full: Dramatic video captures near-death bid for selfies in Central Park | New York Post

author: Lia Eustachewich
title: Dramatic video captures near-death bid for selfies in Central Park
text:
Jaw-dropping video shows a group of youngsters who fell through the ice in Central Park screaming for their lives as they struggle to keep their heads above the frigid waters.
SEE ALSO 
Teens fall through frozen Central Park pond while taking selfies 0:0 https://twitter.com/FDNY/status/833826493549707265 The video, taken by Paraguay tourists Lourdes Ramirez and daughter Maia, also show the seven teens joking and walking out onto the ice — shortly before falling in.
“Bro that s–t gonna fall, bro!” one person is heard yelling on the clip, which was obtained by NBC New York. 
The next clip shows the teens submerged and scrambling to climb out of the icy waters.
“Help!” one of them yells.
All the youths were rescued and treated at the scene for hypothermia.
